name: RPG Template Test
description:
Test demo for an RPG template I'm building in Godot for use in my own games. Current features:

  • Grid-based movement
  • Configurable wandering NPCs
  • Simple dialogue

Using RPG Maker art assets as placeholders, plus a few of my own.

I currently have no plans to release this template for use by others, as it's not exactly user-friendly. I'm just sharing the demo to showcase my work. I'll update it as work continues.

Note: Android version is optimised for use with the Retroid Pocket 2+, and is not playable with just a touch screen.
